description: t-systems russia is currently looking for delivery manager , who is expected to lead and manage a business division, including a big talented team, developing the software products and providing the services for the big data, iot & blockchain areas. responsibilities: lead the multiple projects and teams; attract, develop and retain a world-class workforce, leverage talent management process; develop employee skills and capabilities to achieve business objectives and enable growth and advancement; manage and motivate the employees to reach the expected levels in quality, efficiency and performance; control finance and efficiency management; handling and managing highly escalated operational issues; coordinate and control development, delivery of services, technical solution proposals and projects preparation, business case calculations; provide leadership and guidance to coach and train employees, evaluate their performance, encourage and assist them in their career development. job requirements : university degree in computer science or management; minimum 5 years of professional work experience in managing a team; proven leadership and managerial skills; effective communication, negotiation and interpersonal skills; strong problem solving and decision making abilities; solid knowledge and experience in software engineering; strong focus on customer satisfaction and achievement of results; effective team-building and fostering teamwork skills; abilities to develop, mentor and coach team members; fluent english language speaking and writing skills.
name: delivery manager (dih iot)
